On Saturday, April 25th, Governor Asa Hutchinson declared that no schools in Arkansas hold a traditional graduation ceremony before July 1st. Due to crowds and the need for social distancing, the first proposed graduation date of June 20th as well as the SHS prom on June 13th will not take place. At the present time, graduation on July 25th is still scheduled, but we will continue to follow the guidance of Governor Hutchinson and the Arkansas Department of Health.
